Name: The Angel Wore Red
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
STRAIN stirred ingredients over beer and briefly stir.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A most unusual combination of classic Italian red bitter liqueur, bianco vermouth, crème de menthe and lager combine brilliantly in this refreshing aperitivo.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Dominic Whisson at The American Bar in The Savoy Hotel , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Angel Wore Red contains 173 calories
